channel.title: Mira Welner's Tech Blog!
channel.description: Implemented by request of HackerNews commenters!

item.title: The Codebase at a Very Important (Anonymous) Federal Facility
item.description: An observation of the very low quality of code at a certain important federal lab

item.title: When a Hyperspectral Image is a Cube
item.description: Why I tend to gravitate towards interdiciplinary labs and teams.

item.title: Why I Don't Like Hackathons
item.description: Why I think that events encouraging rushed code are not neccecarily the greatest to participate in.

item.title: Perspectives from the Technical University of Munich
item.description: Some important differences between US university and schools elsewhere.

item.title: Can we communally deprecate git checkout?
item.description: The post that got so much more hate than I anticipated (but perhaps some was warranted).

item.title: How I built this website on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: A step by step guide for beginners on how to host a professional personal site on a pi or a similar small computer.
